# Model parameterization

## Supply Chain Data
Click on a node of the supply chain to link to the data used in the model for each location along the supply chain. 

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(DiagrammeR)

mermaid('
graph LR;
  A(Land)--> D(Producer)
  B(Labor)-->D
  C(Farm <br/> Inputs)-->D
  D-->F("Aggregator<br>(Cleaner)")
  F-->G(Primary <br/> Processor)
  F-->H("Wholesaler<br>(Distributor)")
  G-->H
  G-->I(Secondary <br/> Processor)
  I-->H
  H-->K(NYC Agency)
  G-->K
  H-->L(Commodity and<br>Differentiated<br>Markets)
  G-->L
  
  classDef whiteBox fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:2px
  class A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L whiteBox
  
  click D "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Producers" "Producer data"
  click G "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Primary_Processors" "Primary processor data"
  click H "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Wholesalers" "Wholesaler data"
  click I "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Secondary_Processors" "Secondary processor data"
  click F "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Aggregators" "Cleaner/aggregator data"
  click K "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Agencies" "NYC agency data"
  ')

```
